de.braintags.io.vertx.pojomapper.util

Class QueryHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.braintags.io.vertx.pojomapper.util.QueryHelper

  • public class QueryHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class with several static methods to simplyfy search actions

    • Method Summary

      Executes the given IQuery and returns all found records as List directly to the handler

    • Method Detail

      • findRecordById

        public static final <T> void findRecordById(IDataStore datastore,
                                            java.lang.Class<T> mapperClass,
                                            java.lang.String id,
                                            io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.core.AsyncResult<T>> handler)
        Performs a query by id and returns the found instance, or null, if none
        Parameters:
        datastore - the datastore to be used
        mapperClass - the mapper class
        id - the id to search for
        handler - the handler to be informed

      • executeToFirstRecord

        public static <T> void executeToFirstRecord(IQuery<T> query,
                                            io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.core.AsyncResult<T>> handler)
        Executes the given IQuery and returns the first record directly to the handler. This method can be used, when only one record is expected to be found, like an ID query, for instance. The same than executeToFirstRecord(query, false, handler)
        Parameters:
        query - the query to be executed
        handler - the handler, which will receive the first object

      • executeToFirstRecord

        public static <T> void executeToFirstRecord(IQuery<T> query,
                                            boolean required,
                                            io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.core.AsyncResult<T>> handler)
        Executes the given IQuery and returns the first record directly to the handler. This method can be used, when only one record is expected to be found, like an ID query, for instance
        Parameters:
        query - the query to be executed
        required - defines wether at least one record must exist
        handler - the handler, which will receive the first object

      • executeToList

        public static <T> void executeToList(IQuery<T> query,
                                     io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.core.AsyncResult<java.util.List<T>>> handler)
        Executes the given IQuery and returns all found records as List directly to the handler
        Parameters:
        query - the query to be executed
        handler - the handler, which will receive the list of objects

      • queryResultToList

        public static final <T> void queryResultToList(IQueryResult<T> queryResult,
                                               io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.core.AsyncResult<java.util.List<T>>> handler)
        Creates a complete List of objects from the given IQueryResult
        Parameters:
        queryResult - the IQueryResult to be handled
        handler - the handler to be informed
